Is there a fee for new projects and blockchains to deploy on Verus?
No, there is no fee for new projects and blockchains to deploy on Verus. According to the text, Verus offers a "cost-free, risk-free" road to liquidity for new communities and projects.

ith multi-chain capabilities, Verus will be a go-to destination for new projects and blockchains, as there is an easy, scalable system to deploy, with ready-made cost-free, risk-free roads to liquidity for new communities and projects.
